opportunities.title: Global Startup Challenge 2024
opportunities.description: Join the **Global Startup Challenge**! Compete with the brightest minds globally. For more details, visit [here](https://example.com/startup-challenge).

opportunities.title: EcoTech Innovation Awards 2024
opportunities.description: Apply to the **EcoTech Innovation Awards 2024** to showcase your project and win funding! Details [here](https://example.com/ecotech-awards).

opportunities.title: AI and Robotics Global Summit
opportunities.description: Attend the **AI and Robotics Global Summit** to learn the latest trends in AI and robotics. For more info, visit [here](https://example.com/ai-robotics-summit).

opportunities.title: NextGen EdTech Innovation Competition
opportunities.description: Participate in the **NextGen EdTech Innovation Competition** for a chance to win funding for your project. Learn more [here](https://example.com/edtech-competition).
